column4: my machine does not have internet :S but my friend can acess it via ssh over the net
how so?? you must be connected to the internet for ssh to take place..
perhaps your IP settings are faulty
can you ping -c 4 192.168.2.1 or whatever your router is??
64 bytes from 192.168.2.1: icmp_seq=7 ttl=127 time=0.540 ms
it's a setup issue.. are you using dchp??
but i get the same with static
it may be a gateway issue... perhaps your router is poorly set??
try resetting your router to default then try again to ping those 2 i told you about.. i think it's a gateway issue but not 100% certain
i seem to remember a way to properly set your route via iptables but can't remember the exact commands
